Sports and Clubs: Associated with various science clubs for arousing scientific consciousness among the people
Social And Cultural Activities: Charitable medical services for the needy and the weaker sections of the society and associated with Indian Medical Association (I.M.A.)
Special Interests: Science movement and study of communist literature
Educational Qualifications: M.B.B.S. Educated at N.R.S. Medical College and Hospital, Kolkata, West Bengal
Other Information: Chairman, Sriniketan Santiniketan Development Authority (SSDA), Balpur, West Bengal;Member (i)Court of Viswa-Bharati University; and (ii)Governing Body, Indian Council of Medical Research (I.C.M.R.), 1990-91
